hackathon-description-text: During 24 hours we will organise ourselves in small teams with similar interests. Each team will explore new technologies, try out new techniques, solutions and practices in any way they see fit. We expect to see teams hack away at prototypes to validate their exciting new ideas, intense collaboration within the teams, networking and knowledge sharing amongst the different teams. In short: having a lot of fun and learning a lot of new stuff. We'll end the event with a short presentation round / science fair kind of thing.
hackathon-eligibility: This event is limited to employees of Cegeka. Employees of the Agile Software Factory are automatically allowed to join. Employees of other divisions should get the authorization and budget of their management first.
hackathon-description-header: Exploring new technologies, solutions, techniques and practices. Succeed. Fail. Learn.
